Description: Two Japanese suppliers of automotive electrical components -- Yazaki Corporation and DENSO Corporation -- agreed to plead guilty and to pay a total of $548 million in criminal fines for their involvement in multiple price-fixing and bid-rigging conspiracies in the sale of parts to automobile manufacturers in the United States.
back pay award in unfair labor practices case
